array.string: In Trivia Blitz, you battle other players in a 2 minute battle.
Opps that's not right, try this
Nice job, each right answer gives you points.
Let's try a different type of question. Who is this?
Thats not correct, here are right letters!
Right-o, if you need help answering a question, you can use the eliminate option.
Correct! If you want a little more time you can freeze the clock.
Opps, thats not correct, you have now finished all the questions, we will now take you to the score screen
Congratulation, you have finished all the questions, you will now be taken to the score screen
Normal games are 3 rounds, whoever has the most points wins!
